name: redux-local-persist
description: Redux middleware for selectively loading and saving state to localStorage.

scripts.build: npm install && npx babel src/index.js --out-file lib/index.js --source-maps
scripts.watch: npm install && npx babel src/index.js --watch --out-file lib/index.js --source-maps

author: Cam Tullos <cam@tullos.ninja> (http://cam.tullos.ninja)
